Name: Dance Dance Chelonian!
Description: On an island in a lake around Hongzhen, a Hoartoise seems to have a conflict with other Tacet Discords... Do Tacet Discords lock horns?
QuestDesc: On an island in a lake around Hongzhen, a Hoartoise seems to have a conflict with other Tacet Discords... Do Tacet Discords lock horns?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Seems like it wants to take me somewhere. I should follow it and see what's going on there.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why is it fighting with the Tacet Discords again...

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So you're leading me to help your friend? Didn't expect camaraderie among Hoartoises.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A miraculous music instrument? Chelonian Dance Troupe? What's this all about...

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Hoartoises are heading back to the place we came. Is that "instrument" mentioned in the letter there?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The miraculous instrument is inside of this?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Hoartoises really are dancing... Incredible.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They are jiggling more happily now...

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This Hoartoise is getting mobbed by other Tacet Discords... Looks like it really needs help.
